<div class="treeview"><onlyinclude>
{{{1|}}}* {{nbt|int-array|Id}}: [[UUID]] of owner, stored as four ints. Optional. Used to update the other tags when the chunk loads or the holder logs in, in case the owner's name has changed.
{{{1|}}}* {{nbt|string|Name}}: Username of owner. If missing or empty, the head appears as a Steve head. Otherwise, used to store or retrieve the downloaded skin in the cache. Need not be a valid player name, but must not be all spaces.
{{{1|}}}* {{nbt|compound|Properties}}
{{{1|}}}** {{nbt|list|textures}}
{{{1|}}}*** {{nbt|compound}}: An individual texture.
{{{1|}}}**** {{nbt|string|Value}}: A [[wikipedia:Base64|Base64]]-encoded [[wikipedia:JSON|JSON]] object.
{{{1|}}}***** {{nbt|boolean|isPublic}}: Optional.
{{{1|}}}***** {{nbt|boolean|signatureRequired}}
{{{1|}}}***** {{nbt|string|profileId}}: Optional: The hexadecimal text form of the player's [[UUID]], without hyphens.
{{{1|}}}***** {{nbt|string|profileName}}: Optional: Player name.
{{{1|}}}***** {{nbt|compound|textures}}
{{{1|}}}****** {{nbt|compound|CAPE}}: Optional.
{{{1|}}}******* {{nbt|string|url}}: URL of a player cape (64x32 PNG).
{{{1|}}}****** {{nbt|compound|SKIN}}
{{{1|}}}******* {{nbt|string|url}}: URL of a player skin on textures.minecraft.net.
{{{1|}}}******* {{nbt|compound|metadata}}
{{{1|}}}******** {{nbt|string|model}}: The model of the player skin. Can be "classic" or "slim".
{{{1|}}}***** {{nbt|long|timestamp}}: Optional: [[wikipedia:Unix time|Unix time]] in milliseconds.
{{{1|}}}**** {{nbt|string|Signature}}: Optional.</onlyinclude>
